Computing resources

Because our work is quantitative, research computing skills are an important part of your toolset. Most of our team uses the open source software R for a lot of their workflow, though you probably want to also learn an additional tools.

Fortunuately, there are heaps of resources, including your teammates, to help you with your learning.
